titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the 100 percent tariff imposed on soups and broths from France and Germany.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to eliminate the 100% duty on soups and broths from France and Germany.
